Generate initial conditions for FLARE

generate_initial_conditions.Rd

Generate initial conditions for FLARE

Usage

generate_initial_conditions(
  states_config,
  obs_config,
  pars_config = NULL,
  obs,
  config,
  obs_non_vertical
)

Arguments

states_config

list; list of state configurations

obs_config

list; list of observation configurations

pars_config

list; list of parameter configurations (Default = NULL)

obs

array; array of the observations. Required dimensions are [nobs, time, depth]

config

list; list of configurations

obs_non_vertical

list; observations of variables that don't have vertical dimension.

Value

list; list contains the initial conditions objects required by run_da_forecast()

Details

Function to generate initial conditions from either default values in the states_config, observations (if available), or a previous run using the output as a restart file.

Author

Quinn Thomas

On this page

Developed by R. Quinn Thomas.
